then(DoneCallback<D>) - Method in interface io.reinert.gdeferred.Promise
Equivalent to Promise.done(DoneCallback).
then(DoneCallback<D>, FailCallback<F>) - Method in interface io.reinert.gdeferred.Promise
Equivalent to Promise.done(DoneCallback) and then FailCallback.
then(DoneCallback<D>, FailCallback<F>, ProgressCallback<P>) - Method in interface io.reinert.gdeferred.Promise
Equivalent to Promise.done(DoneCallback), then FailCallback, then Promise.progress(ProgressCallback).
then(DoneFilter<D, D_OUT>) - Method in interface io.reinert.gdeferred.Promise
Equivalent to then(doneFilter, null, null).
then(DoneFilter<D, D_OUT>, FailFilter<F, F_OUT>) - Method in interface io.reinert.gdeferred.Promise
Equivalent to then(doneFilter, failFilter, null).
then(DoneFilter<D, D_OUT>, FailFilter<F, F_OUT>, ProgressFilter<P, P_OUT>) - Method in interface io.reinert.gdeferred.Promise
If any of the filter is not specified, a default No Op filter would be used.
then(DonePipe<D, D_OUT, F_OUT, P_OUT>) - Method in interface io.reinert.gdeferred.Promise
Equivalent to then(DonePipe, null, null).
then(DonePipe<D, D_OUT, F_OUT, P_OUT>, FailPipe<F, D_OUT, F_OUT, P_OUT>) - Method in interface io.reinert.gdeferred.Promise
Equivalent to then(DonePipe, FailPipe, null).
then(DonePipe<D, D_OUT, F_OUT, P_OUT>, FailPipe<F, D_OUT, F_OUT, P_OUT>, ProgressPipe<P, D_OUT, F_OUT, P_OUT>) - Method in interface io.reinert.gdeferred.Promise
This method is similar to jQuery's pipe() method, where a new Promise is returned by the the pipe filter instead of the original.
